issue.title: [C++] Remove make_unique reimplementation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17814](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17814). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `make_unique` reimplementation in `arrow/util/make_unique.h` can simply be replace with `std::make_unique`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17814?focusedCommentId=17608104) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
`[~wgtmac]` Do you want to submit a PR?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17814?focusedCommentId=17608108) by Gang Wu (wgtmac):*
`[~apitrou]` Sure, I will work on it.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17814?focusedCommentId=17608348) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14204
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14204>
